html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-00752023-02-02,  ,  ,  HC,  PHAC, 
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER in order to (1) support Canada’s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by decreasing the risk of importing cases from outside the country; and (2) require every person seeking to enter Canada, regardless of vaccination status, to test for COVID-19 prior to boarding, if they depart on a flight originating from China, Hong Kong or Macao.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Minimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order
